Package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.gui

Class ParseTreeTablePresentation

java.lang.Object
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.gui.ParseTreeTablePresentation
public class ParseTreeTablePresentation extends Object
The model that backs the parse tree in the GUI.

    • getIndexOfChild

      public int getIndexOfChild(Object parent, Object child)
      Return the index of child in parent. If either parent or child is null, returns -1. If either parent or child don't belong to this tree model, returns -1.
      Parameters:
      parent - a node in the tree, obtained from this data source.
      child - the node we are interested in.
      Returns:
      the index of the child in the parent, or -1 if either child or parent are null or don't belong to this tree model.

      Returns:

    • getChildAtDetailAst

      private Object getChildAtDetailAst(DetailAST parent, int index)
      Gets child of DetailAST node at specified index.
      Parameters:
      parent - DetailAST node
      index - child index
      Returns:
      child DetailsAST or DetailNode if child is Javadoc node and parseMode is JAVA_WITH_JAVADOC_AND_COMMENTS.
